title: Punjab bans manufacture, sale of gutkha, pan masala for one year | punjab$chandigarh | Hindustan Times
text:
Punjab bans manufacture, sale of gutkha, pan masala for one year punjab Updated: Feb 22, 2017 22:40 IST PTI, Chandigarh The ban also applies on processed, flavoured, scented, chewing tobacco, whether they are packaged or unpackaged or sold as one or separate products, an official spokesperson said.(HT file ) 
Punjab government on Wednesday said it has prohibited the manufacture, storage, sale or distribution of food products containing tobacco or nicotine like gutkha and pan masala in the state for one year. 
The ban also applies on processed, flavoured, scented, chewing tobacco, whether they are packaged or unpackaged or sold as one or separate products, an official spokesperson said. 
“The decision has been taken in view of the orders of the Supreme Court wherein it observed that to circumvent ban of sale of gutkha, the manufacturers are selling pan masala (without tobacco) with flavoured chewing tobacco in separate sachets,” he said. tags
